title: Is the FM station at 94.1 owned by the same company that operates the Christian station WLSG 1340 AM?  It is simulcasting the same programming but is very weak and basically only heard downtown.  Are there plans to improve the signal and broadcast in stereo?  It sounds like the feed is coming off the internet with very poor quality,
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/01/94-1fm-owned-company-wlsg-1340/
